text: @PresidencyZA @CyrilRamaphosa @DrZweliMkhize Great Job! Sure you know this, but we have to #easelockdown & monitor hospitals are not overwhelmed not just infection rates. while Economy kicks into gear.#ANC gets this right, we have had the best #covid19 response in the world if it doesn’t it could be the worst
